description: This week we give you a special exercise torture themed update. Ariel X gets oiled up and down into squats, lunges, and sit-ups that leave her sweating and gasping for air. When she doesn't perform quickly enough she is punished with electricity, and when she's good she gets orgasms out of her exhausted body. By the end of the day Ariel is well fucked and really fucking tired.
title: Exercise Torture
